scripts.test:api:local: cross-env API_URL=http://localhost:3000 cucumber-js --tags "@api" ; npm run report
scripts.test:e2e:headless: cross-env HEADLESS=true cucumber-js --tags "not @api" ; npm run report
scripts.test:e2e:headed: cross-env HEADLESS=false cucumber-js --tags "not @api" ; npm run report
scripts.test:all: npm run test:api:local && npm run test:e2e:headless
